  • Uses of Vector in elements

    Fields in elements declared as Vector
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Vector SpotLight._direction
    direction - the direction of the light focus - the narrowing factor, the beam gets narrower and weaker as it gets bigger.
    private Vector Camera._Vright
    Z axis vector
    private Vector Camera._Vto
    X axis vector
    private Vector Camera._Vup
    _Vup - Y axis vector

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vector DirectionalLight.getL​(Point3D p)
    function to get the ray from the light source to the given point

    function to get the ray from the light source to the given point
    Vector PointLight.getL​(Point3D p)
    function to get the ray from the light source to the given point
    Vector Camera.getVright()
    get the right vector of the camera (represent the x axis of camera, position of the view)
    Vector Camera.getVto()
    get the forward vector of the camera (represent the z axis of camera, forward direction of the view)
    Vector Camera.getVup()
    get the upper vector of the camera (represent the y axis of camera, position of the view)
    Methods in elements with parameters of type Vector
    Modifier and Type Method Description

    function to set new direction vectors to the camera according to a rotating axis

    Constructor Description

    Fields in primitives declared as Vector
    Modifier and Type Field Description

    _p0 - starting point of Ray
    Methods in primitives that return Vector
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vector Vector.add​(Vector v)
    adds a vector to current vector and return the sum addition of vectors is addition of the fitting coordinates
    Vector Vector.crossProduct​(Vector v)
    calculates and return the cross product of the current vector in a given vector the way is to create a vector: (y1z2-z1y2, z1x2-x1z2, x1y2-y1x2)
    Vector Ray.getDir()
    get direction of ray
    Vector Vector.normalize()
    normalizes the vector - so its length will be 1.
    Vector Vector.normalized()
    normalizes the vector - so its length will be 1.
    Vector Vector.scale​(double mul)
    calculates and return the multyplation in scalar of the current vector in a given scalar the way is to multiply every coordinate in the scalar
    Vector Point3D.subtract​(Point3D pt2)
    calculates a vector to a given point
    Vector Vector.subtract​(Vector v)
    subtracts a vector from current vector and return the difference subtraction of vectors is subtraction of the fitting coordinates
    Methods in primitives with parameters of type Vector
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Point3D Point3D.add​(Vector vector)
    adds a vector to current point and return its edge
    Vector Vector.add​(Vector v)
    adds a vector to current vector and return the sum addition of vectors is addition of the fitting coordinates
    Vector Vector.crossProduct​(Vector v)
    calculates and return the cross product of the current vector in a given vector the way is to create a vector: (y1z2-z1y2, z1x2-x1z2, x1y2-y1x2)
    double Vector.dotProduct​(Vector v)
    calculates and return the dot product of the current vector in a given vector the way is to multiply fitting coordinates from current vector in coordinates in given vector, and sum all the results
    java.util.List<Ray> Ray.randomRaysInCircle​(Point3D center, Vector vUp, Vector vRight, double radius, int numRays, double dist)
    auxiliary function to randomly scatter points within a circular surface.

    auxiliary function to randomly scatter points within a rectangular surface.
    void Vector.rotateVector​(Vector axis, double theta)
    function to rotate the direction of "this" vector, according to a new direction axis, in the difference angle
    Vector Vector.subtract​(Vector v)
    subtracts a vector from current vector and return the difference subtraction of vectors is subtraction of the fitting coordinates
